ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
While G.I. JOE continues to adjust to their new circumstances, COBRA COMMANDER begins making his play to unite COBRA. However, his serpentine plot has many twists and turns, and with ZARTAN, DESTRO and BARONESS in the mix, the results may be unexpectedâ€”and dangerous! All the pieces fall into place in G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero #203!
